label: 赤漆
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: This method of red lacquering involves staining the base red and then coating with transparent lacquer. It was widely used in the Nara period on woodwork, as well as on woven basketry. This differs from another method of red lacquering (shuurushi) in which vermillion is mixed into the transparent lacquer before application. [朱漆]
